comments:
Steps to reproduce:

1) Get project from bug 97466 in attachment
2) Create workspace with this project in it
3) Go to dj.test.DjTests.
4) Select the name of the annotation ErrorString in the outliner
5) Right-click>Refactor>Infer Generic Type Arguments...
6) Preview

You should get the stack trace below. I know this operation has nothing to do
with annotations, but it should be a no-op, not an internal failure.

Markus, we should investigate a fix for RC2 if this can happen often. 

Is this bug related a dup of 91379, 94668.
Fixed. The error was caused by the TypeLiteral ErrorString.class.
verified steps in comment 0 do not lead to any exceptions.
